name: keygate
description: Personal AI agent gateway - control your computer via a single Brain

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @keygate/core build && pnpm --filter @keygate/discord build && pnpm --filter @keygate/cli build
scripts.onboard: pnpm --filter @keygate/cli exec tsx src/main.ts onboard --auth-choice openai-codex
scripts.auth:login: pnpm --filter @keygate/cli exec tsx src/main.ts auth login --provider openai-codex
